page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT II
page.content: The main manufacturing employer in the area is the Costain Concrete Works employing approximately 100 workers and a metal reprocessing plant (GR.816545). The largest sector of employment in this area is in the service industries e.g. shops(at the north side of Manse road Newmains-A722), public houses(e.g."The Fourways" GR.823559 "The Cascade" GR.802569) garages (e.g.Cooper's garage GR.822554). Other sources of employment include Nimmo Joiner and Shopfitter GR.804554 and Stewarts Coach builders GR.802554 There is a strong possibility that the latter mentioned site may be replaced by a Safeways food store in the not to distant future. At present Safeways is situated nearer the centre of Wishaw and outwith this area .
